basic.description: This course focuses on the emergence and current impact of women- and minority-owned businesses. The course also considers special challenges and opportunities that women and minority entrepreneurs confront. Course may include discussions with successful women and minority business owners.
basic.subject: ENT
basic.title: Women and Minorities in New Ventures

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ENT 3003 or both ENT 2010 and ENT 2011.
